text: This was the first edition of the tournament. Yūichi Sugita won the title, defeating Adrián Menéndez-Maceiras in the final, 6–7(1–7), 6–4, 6–4. ==Seeds== ==Draw== ===Finals=== ===Top half=== ===Bottom half=== ==References== * Main Draw * Qualifying Draw KPIT MSLTA Challenger - Singles
title: 2014 KPIT MSLTA Challenger – Singles
